Translations.Text: I ne dumay, chto Allakh nebrezhet tem, chto tvoryat nepravednyye. On otsrochivayet im do dnya, kogda vzory zakatyatsya
ustremlyayas' toroplivo s podnyatymi vverkh golovami, vzory k nim ne vozvrashchayutsya, i serdtsa ikh - vozdukh

Uveshchevay zhe lyudey o tom dne, kogda pridet k nim nakazaniye! I skazhut te, kotoryye byli obidchikami: "Gospodi nash! Otsroch' nam do blizkogo predela, - my otvetim na Tvoy prizyv i posleduyem za poslantsami". Razve zh vy ne klyalis' ran'she, chto net u vas izmeneniya
I vy poselilis' v zhilishchakh tekh, kotoryye obideli samikh sebya, i stalo yasno dlya vas, kak My postupili s nimi, i priveli My vam pritchi
a oni khitrili svoyey khitrost'yu, no u Allakha vsya ikh khitrost', khotya by ot khitrosti ikh i gory dvigalis'
Ne schitay Allakha narushayushchim Svoye obeshchaniye Svoim poslannikam: ved' Allakh - slaven, obladatel' mshcheniya
v tot den', kogda zemlya budet zamenena drugoy zemley, i - nebesa, i predstanut pred Allakhom, yedinym, moguchim
I uvidish' ty greshnikov v tot den', svyazannykh tsepyami
Odeyaniye ikh iz smoly, litsa ikh pokryvayet ogon'
chtoby Allakh vozdal kazhdoy dushe to, chto priobrela. Poistine, Allakh bystr v raschete
Eto - soobshcheniye dlya lyudey, i pust' uveshchevayut im i pust' znayut, chto On - Bog, yedinyy, i pust' opomnyatsya obladayushchiye razumom
